data.name: ITTA
data.detailed_description:
Itta is alone. Surrounded by her dead family. With only a mysterious floating cat by her side, she takes up her father's old revolver and sets out across a broken world on a quest for revenge and answers. As Itta travels, she'll encounter people desperate for her help, powerful new weapons to master, strange beasts determined to block her path, and the truth at the heart of this apocalyptic interstice. Your skills and spirit will be tested as you battle gods and fallen heroes along this journey of hope and horror.


  • Discover ancient artifacts and weapons that will prove essential to your survival.
  • Dance through danger in tight, twin-stick, bullet-hell combat.
  • Meet with various locals and help determine their fate.
  • Unearth the truth of this mysterious interstice.
  • Explore a beautiful, pixel-art world backed by a haunting and eclectic musical score.


Glass Revolver is the studio of developer, Jacob Williams. Inspired by everything from manga to Italian gardens, His aim is to deliver eclectic games that are uncompromising in their bizarre vision.

Kyle Lisenby is a self taught multi-instrumentalist and composer who cut his teeth in post-rock bands Red Cloud at Sundown and Siren. He has been releasing compositions under the name Invisible Monsters since 2007 and feels most at home in uncharted waters.

Itta is alone. Surrounded by her dead family. With only a mysterious floating cat by her side, she takes up her father's old revolver and sets out across a broken world on a quest for revenge and answers. As Itta travels, she'll encounter people desperate for her help, powerful new weapons to master, strange beasts determined to block her path, and the truth at the heart of this apocalyptic interstice. data.short_description: Vanquish nightmarish bosses and explore a crumbling world as a young girl accompanied only by a ghost cat and an arsenal of guns in ITTA, a bullet-hell adventure game. At the end of the world, when there's no one left to lean on, who can you rely on but yourself?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
